title: By Adverse Winds. [A novel.]
author: Smeaton, William Henry Oliphant.
snippet: This wasduring Mrs. Langton's period of devotion to the State Churchand the Moloch of Erastianism, as she stated in after-years. On this account the widow of the umquhil William Langtonassumed "quite a mildly flirtatious air," and actually committed the astounding indiscretion to walk one Sundayafternoon as far as Old Pentland with Mr. Durden, to visita miner's wife whom Providence had blessed with twins theday before!
